title: Would you pay $14 a minute for phone calls? Now prison inmates won’t have to either
text:
Would you pay $14 a minute for phone calls? Now prison inmates won’t have to either 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
The FCC is taking "further steps to rein in the excessive rates and egregious fees on phone calls paid by some of society’s most vulnerabl...
